languages.text: "Кардинал Анвилас, испрашивая разрешения пытать святого человека, вы преступаете закон мирской и церковный. За это я приговариваю вас к казни!"
languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_CardinalPenance
Дать Даргонусу эфф+
казним кардинала пушкой
Весы направо

languages.text: "Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"
languages.original_text: "Кардинал Анвилас, испрашивая разрешения пытать святого человека, вы преступаете закон мирской и церковный. За это я приговариваю вас к казни!"

traits.locale_text: "Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"
"Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"
"Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"

"Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"
"Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"

languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_CardinalPenance
Дать Даргонусу эфф+
казним кардинала пушкой
Весы направо

languages.text: "Kardinal Anvylas, mit dem Gesuch, einen heiligen Mann foltern zu dürfen, verstoßt Ihr gegen weltliche und geistliche Gesetze. Dafür verurteile ich Euch zum Tode!"
languages.original_text: "Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: "Kardinal Anvylas, mit dem Gesuch, einen heiligen Mann foltern zu dürfen, verstoßt Ihr gegen weltliche und geistliche Gesetze. Dafür verurteile ich Euch zum Tode!"

languages.text: « Cardinal Anvylas, en demandant la permission de torturer un saint homme, vous avez enfreint la loi séculaire aussi bien que la loi ecclésiastique. Par conséquent, je vous condamne à mort ! »
languages.original_text: "Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: « Cardinal Anvylas, en demandant la permission de torturer un saint homme, vous avez enfreint la loi séculaire aussi bien que la loi ecclésiastique. Par conséquent, je vous condamne à mort ! »

languages.text: “安维拉斯主教，你打算折磨一位圣人，你的行为违背了世俗法律与国教律法。因此，我要为你的违法行为判处你死刑！”
languages.original_text: "Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: “安维拉斯主教，你打算折磨一位圣人，你的行为违背了世俗法律与国教律法。因此，我要为你的违法行为判处你死刑！”

languages.text: «Cardenal Anvylas, al pedir permiso para torturar a un hombre santo infringe la ley, tanto laica como eclesiástica. Por lo tanto, ¡queda condenado a muerte!».
languages.original_text: "Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: «Cardenal Anvylas, al pedir permiso para torturar a un hombre santo infringe la ley, tanto laica como eclesiástica. Por lo tanto, ¡queda condenado a muerte!».

languages.text: 「アンビラス枢機卿、聖人を拷問する許可を求めるということは、世俗法と教会法の両方に違反している。そのため、死刑を宣告する！」
languages.original_text: "Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: 「アンビラス枢機卿、聖人を拷問する許可を求めるということは、世俗法と教会法の両方に違反している。そのため、死刑を宣告する！」

languages.text: "Kardinal Anvylas, kutsal bir adama işkence etmek için izin isteyerek hem dünyevi hem de dinî kanunları ihlal ediyorsun. Dolayısıyla seni idama mahkûm ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Cardinal Anvylas, in seeking permission to torture a holy man, you are violating both secular and ecclesiastic law. For that, I sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: "Kardinal Anvylas, kutsal bir adama işkence etmek için izin isteyerek hem dünyevi hem de dinî kanunları ihlal ediyorsun. Dolayısıyla seni idama mahkûm ediyorum!"
